ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Bard Crowd Control
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been lucky to group with a lot of the same people - and I ve pretty much weened them off of the Manasong during combat mentality.  Personally I think
ygData.messageBody:
I've been lucky to group with a lot of the same people - and I've pretty
much weened them off of the "Manasong during combat" mentality. Personally
I think the only time it really makes sense is when you have a cleric in a
group that requires a LOT of healing...

Sometimes I will include it in a 3-song twist (not the every other song mana
twist to maximize its value) if people whine for it enough - if they see the
message they are happy)..

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 13, 2000 10:40 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Bard Crowd Control



i have to agree with you, a bard's life does change at 32, it becomes easier
to get a group because of mana song, and to like you said, most groups
couldnt care less about any other songs. you become the mana battery... When
